mapper.insert: insert into tbl_book(in_out, sum, classify, spend_type, other) values(#{in_out}, #{sum}, #{classify}, #{spend_type}, #{other})
mapper.update: update tbl_book set in_out=#{in_out}, sum=#{sum}, classify=#{classify}, spend_type=#{spend_type}, other=#{other} where no=#{no}
mapper.select: select * from tbl_book where no > 0 order by no desc, enterdate desc
